Package gfx_panel

Interface Summary
GfxPanelNotifiee Notifications Receiver from the GfxPanel.
 

Class Summary
GfxPanel A drawing panel that supports different shapes and many features like snapping.
OvalShape this class inherited form Shape class.
RectangleShape Rectange Shape Class, represents a rectangle drawn on the GfxPanel.
Shape Parent of all Shapes.
Snapper Snapping utility, to snap shapes to each other.
 

Enum Summary
GfxPanel.Direction Direction, used in snapping and maybe othe stuff in the future.
